channel.title: Shop Error
channel.description:
Whenever i trade someone on a shop i get this error?
[code] [client-8-Mladen]: Loading finished. java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -116 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:18523) at client.packetProcess(client.java:17204) at client.packetSending(client.java:17173) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138) at server.main(server.java:53) pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception Game saved for player Mladen ClientHandler: Client Mladen disconnected. [/code]

item.title: Shop Error
item.dc:creator: @MladenJ MladenJ
item.description:
@MladenJ wrote:

Whenever i trade someone on a shop i get this error?

[client-8-Mladen]: Loading finished.
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -116
        at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:18523)
        at client.packetProcess(client.java:17204)
        at client.packetSending(client.java:17173)
        at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138)
        at server.main(server.java:53)
pimpscape Server [fatal] - exception
Game saved for player Mladen
ClientHandler: Client Mladen disconnected.

Read full topic
